itemDescription: professor of business in West Yorkshire

wikipedia_page.main: John Thompson, has been the  Roger M Bale Professor of Entrepreneurship at the University of Huddersfield in West Yorkshire, United Kingdom, since 1997. In 2009, he was awarded the Queen's Award for Enterprise Promotion.
